block-definition.s: attach %'amount' LED NeoPixel stripe to pin %'pin'

block.l: var data =[0xF0, //START_SYSEX 0x74, //NEOPIXEL REGISTER parseInt(pin), parseInt(amount), 0xF7 //END_SYSEX ]; this.arduino.board.transport.write(new Buffer(data));

block-definition.s: set LED %'LED number' to R: %'r' G: %'g' B: %'b'

block.l: var data =[0xF0, //START_SYSEX 0x72, //NEOPIXEL parseInt(ledNum), parseInt(r), parseInt(g), parseInt(b), 0xF7 //END_SYSEX ]; this.arduino.board.transport.write(new Buffer(data));
